game.name: Sword Princess Sistina
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam Cloud, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Since a young age, Sistina has been lauded as the Sword Princess thanks to her masterful bladework. When the Demon God is accidentally unleashed, those skills are put to the test as she faces unstoppable adversaries!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Since a young age, Sistina has been lauded as the Sword Princess thanks to her masterful bladework. When the Demon God is accidentally unleashed, those skills are put to the test as she faces unstoppable adversaries!
